description.value: More future memories of time magic percolate back to the present, teaching you spells you've yet to learn. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3mQkAjexj6hhAnkR]{Behold the Weave}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OdqM06M0wDUqZWiR]{Cast into Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mLAYvbafVKfBgEhz]{Loose Time's Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lETZeqBPoj2htGVk]{Quicken Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3E1p58MNQMO4GAxt]{Stagnate Time} to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
